thread.title: Villa With a Musical Legacy: Pierre Boulez’s Home in Baden-Baden

author: J.S. Marcus
title: Villa With a Musical Legacy: Pierre Boulez’s Home in Baden-Baden
text:
For over half a century, a stately Belle Époque villa in the German spa town of Baden-Baden served as a redoubt for French conductor and composer Pierre Boulez. Following Mr. Boulez’s death in 2016 at the age of 90, his heirs have put the property on the market for €2.5 million ($3 million).
The pink sandstone mansion dates back to 1897,...
